forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. Then remaining overcast in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers of rain and wet snow in the morning. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
